The graveyards contain over 70,000 medieval tombstones, which date from the 12th to 16th centuries. The tombstones are unique in their style and are decorated with ornaments and carvings that tell stories of the time when they were made. The site is significant for its cultural and artistic value and provides insight into the medieval period of the Balkans.
